Detailed Description

Class containing the actual values for morph displacement.

Member Function Documentation

int DzMorphDeltas::addDelta ( int  vertIdx,
const DzVec3 &  pos,
bool  checkForDuplicates = true,
unsigned char  deltaFlag = 0 
) [slot]

Add a morph delta.

Parameters:
vertIdx The index of the vertex to set delta values for.
pos The delta value for the vertex.
checkForDuplicates If true, the list of deltas will be checked for any previous deltas assigned to the vertex before adding the delta. Otherwise, it is assumed no deltas have been added for the specified vertex.
deltaFlag Flag value for this delta.
Returns:
The index of the delta
int DzMorphDeltas::addDelta ( int  vertIdx,
float  deltaX,
float  deltaY,
float  deltaZ,
bool  checkForDuplicates = true,
unsigned char  deltaFlag = 0 
) [slot]

Add a morph delta.

Parameters:
vertIdx The index of the vertex to set delta values for.
deltaX The X-axis value for the delta
deltaY The Y-axis value for the delta
deltaZ The Z-axis value for the delta
checkForDuplicates If true, the list of deltas will be checked for any previous deltas assigned to the vertex before adding the delta. Otherwise, it is assumed no deltas have been added for the specified vertex.
deltaFlag Flag value for this delta.
Returns:
The index of the delta
int DzMorphDeltas::addDeltas ( const DzIntArray &  indexes,
const DzTArray< DzVec3 > &  deltas,
const DzTArray< unsigned char >  ignoreDeltaFlags,
bool  checkForDuplicates = true 
)

Add a morph delta.

Parameters:
indexes List of indexes, must be same length as deltas
deltas List of deltas, must be same length as indexes
ignoreDeltaFlags List of flags for each delta, must be same length as deltas
checkForDuplicates If true, the list of deltas will be checked for any previous deltas assigned to the vertex before adding the delta. Otherwise, it is assumed no deltas have been added for the specified vertex.
Returns:
The number of deltas added, or -1 if the size of indexes is not the same as deltas
int DzMorphDeltas::addDeltas ( const DzIntArray &  indexes,
const DzTArray< DzVec3 > &  deltas,
bool  checkForDuplicates = true 
)

Add a morph delta.

Parameters:
indexes List of indexes, must be same length as deltas
deltas List of deltas, must be same length as indexes
checkForDuplicates If true, the list of deltas will be checked for any previous deltas assigned to the vertex before adding the delta. Otherwise, it is assumed no deltas have been added for the specified vertex.
Returns:
The number of deltas added, or -1 if the size of indexes is not the same as deltas

bool DzMorphDeltas::hasDeltas (  )  const [slot]

Check to see if any deltas are assigned.

Returns:
true if there are any deltas that exist in this set. Will return false if the deltas have not been loaded from file yet.

void DzMorphDeltas::removeDelta ( int  deltaIdx  )  [slot]

Remove the specified delta given by the deltaIdx

Parameters:
deltaIdx The index of the delta to be removed.
void DzMorphDeltas::removeDuplicateDeltas (  )  [slot]

Removes any duplicate deltas that are in the array. Only the earliest instance in the delta array is kept. WARNING: this method is very slow.

DzMorphDeltas * DzMorphDeltas::removeIgnoredDeltas (  )  const [slot]

Makes a deep copy of the deltas and removes deltas that have been flagged to be ignored

Returns:
A pointer to the new DzMorphDeltas

UnLoads the deltas list from file if it was loaded

virtual bool DzMorphDeltas::usesDeferredLoading (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Derived classes should override this to indicate if they use deferred loading (do not load the object data at main file load time). If a class returns false, it must call loadFromFile() at a later time to invoke loading of its data.

Reimplemented from DzStorable.
